title: Henry V and Thomas Cromwell – hero and villain
itunes:title: Henry V and Thomas Cromwell – hero and villain
itunes:subtitle: We challenge the reputations of two titans of English history. Anne Curry explores Henry V's disreputable youth, while Diarmaid Macculloch offers a robust defence of Wolf Hall star Thomas Cromwell. Rob Attar presents
description:
We challenge the reputations of two titans of English history. Anne Curry explores Henry V's disreputable youth, while Diarmaid Macculloch offers a robust defence of Wolf Hall star Thomas Cromwell. Rob Attar presents

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
